::Epyon/Hot Rod/Prowl/Skyburst::

Epyon watches, in shock, as he whip is broken.
"By the Matrix, that thing is strong! Everyone, concentrait your fire on
it!"

Epyon fires two continues eye beams, and two 45cal. gattaling guns at
D-13.

Hot Rod starts shooting 4 continues laser beams against D-13, as well as
two eye beams. He also launches two missiles at the dragon.

Prowl shoots two acid shells, two eye beams, and two 'ninja' stars at
D-13.

Skyburst shoots two eye beams, and two fusion lasers at D-13.
